summary.span: 表示分布式环境中终结点之间的通信单元。

span.span: Represents the unit of communication between endpoints in a distributed environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种方法，使网络中的发送方和接收方之间可对任意信息进行通信。The class provides a means of communicating arbitrary information between a sender and a receiver on a network. 使用它可以传递信息、建议或要求执行一系列操作或请求数据。It can be used to relay information, suggest or demand a course of action, or request data. 对象的结构表示的是 SOAP 信封。The structure of a object represents a SOAP envelope. 它由两个不同的部分组成：消息的正文和一个可选择的标头集合，由 类表示。It consists of two distinct parts: the message's body and an optional collection of headers, represented by the class. 消息内容是发送方发送给接收方的应用程序定义数据。The message content is application-defined data sent from a sender to a receiver. 消息头使系统和应用程序具有了扩展性来满足变化的要求，因为您可以定义代码来操作和响应特定标头。The message headers enable system and application extensibility to meet the changing requirements, because you can define code to manipulate and respond to specific headers. 您也可以定义自己的标头。You can also define your own headers. 消息头与消息内容一起进行序列化或反序列化。Message headers are serialized or deserialized along with the contents of the message. 以特别的格式接收和发送消息。Messages are received and sent in particular formats. 支持两种格式：基于文本的标准 XML 格式和基于二进制的 XML 格式。Support is provided for two formats: the standard text-based XML format and a binary-based XML format. 对象可用于表示 SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2 信封。The object can be used to represent both SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2 envelopes. 请注意， 的实例在创建时已固定，并绑定到特定的 SOAP 版本。Note that an instance of is fixed upon creation and is bound to a specific SOAP version. 属性表示消息的 SOAP 版本。The property represents the SOAP version of the message. 使用 方法可将 对象序列化到外部存储区。A object can be serialized to an external store by using the method. 也可将消息的属性序列化，但需要对它们单独进行标识并分别进行序列化。Properties of the message can also be serialized, but they have to be individually identified and serialized separately. 使用 ，可反序列化消息来创建一个内存中 对象。Deserializing a message to create an in-memory object can be done using . 针对特定的 实例，属性也必须是单独进行反序列化，并手动添加到属性集合中。Properties must also be deserialized individually and manually added to the property collection for the specific instance. 对象的大小也固定为其传输的数据的大小。The size of a object is fixed to the size of data it is transmitting. 每个正文都建模为 的实例，对于 实例包装的流的大小没有预定义限制。Every body is modeled as an instance of , with no predefined limit on the size of the stream that the instance is wrapping. 但是，特定的通道提供程序可以对其处理的消息的大小做出限制。However, specific channel providers can have a limit on the size of messages that they process. 使用一个已检查和处理了消息的实体所生成的有用信息可批注 。A can be annotated with useful information generated by an entity that has examined and processed the message. 和 属性提供了此功能。This functionality is provided by the and properties. 集合表示消息上的 SOAP 标头集。The collection represents the set of SOAP headers on the message. 属性表示消息上的处理级别批注集。The property represents the set of processing-level annotations on the message. 由于标头中的信息通过网络传输，检查标头的实体必须支持标头使用的协议的基础版本。Because information in headers is transmitted on the wire, an entity that examines a header must support the underlying version(s) of the protocols used by the header. 但是，属性提供一种与版本更加无关的方式来批注消息。However, properties provide a more version-independent way of annotating a message. 若要创建 实例，请使用其中一个 方法。To create a instance, use one of the methods. 建议消息使用者使用完消息内容后，总是调用 。It is recommended that a consumer of a message always call when the consumer is finished accessing the contents of the message. 此操作可释放与消息生存期相关联的有限系统资源（如套接字、命名管道）。This action frees finite system resources (for example, sockets, named pipes) that are tied to the lifetime of the message. 针对从此类派生的托管 C++ 用户的特别说明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 将清理代码放入 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）中，而不是放入析构函数中。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用析构函数：它们会导致编译器自动生成 。Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用非引用成员：它们可能会导致编译器自动生成 。Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用终结器；但如果包含一个终结器，则应该禁止显示生成警告并从 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）调用 和终结器本身，以便模拟自动生成的 行为。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了使用通道工厂发送消息并读取回复的客户端。The following code example shows a client that uses the channel factory to send a message and read the reply. [!code-csharp[Message#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/message/cs/client.cs#0)] [!code-vb[Message#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/message/vb/client.vb#0)]

summary.span: 关闭 并释放任何资源。

span.span: Closes the and releases any resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确实具有一个终结器，当消息作为垃圾回收时，它会为您调用 。The does have a finalizer, which causes to be called for you when the message is garbage-collected. 这不是最佳的做法，因为当系统资源不足而不是内存不足时，并不需要运行 .NET Framework 的垃圾回收 (GC) 机制。This is non-optimal, as the .NET Framework's Garbage Collection (GC) mechanism does not necessarily run when you run out of system resources other than memory. 因此，不再使用消息内容时都应该调用此方法。For this reason, you should always call this method when finished with the contents of the message. 方法是 （也可由 ）的同义词。The method is a synonym for (which also implements). 释放消息时，消息也会释放用于构造正文的对象。The message also disposes the object that was used to construct the body when it is disposed. 关闭消息后，如果调用任何方法或访问消息的任何属性，都会引发 。An is thrown if you call any method or access any properties of the message once it is closed. 关闭消息后，调用任何方法或访问与消息相关的其他对象（例如，消息头集合、消息属性值或为正文和标头返回的 实例）的任何属性都会出现不可确定的行为。Calling any method or accessing any properties of other objects related to the message once it is closed, (such as message header collection, message property values, or instances returned for the body or for a header) has undefined behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建消息，将它发送给服务，并接收响应消息。The following code example shows how to create a message, send it to a service and receive a response message. 将显示响应消息的内容，然后关闭消息。The response message content is displayed and then the message is closed. [!code-csharp[Message#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/message/cs/client.cs#0)] [!code-vb[Message#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/message/vb/client.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得 `envelopeReader.` 的所有权 takes ownership of `envelopeReader.` 此方法读取信封，将所有标头放入标头集合缓冲区中，并读取直到（但不包括）`Body` 开始标记为止的内容，然后返回消息。This method reads the envelope, buffers all the headers into the header collection, and reads up to but not including the `Body` start tag, and returns the message. 如果方法调用引发异常，它将关闭读取器。If the method call throws an exception, it closes the reader. 然后可以读取或写入所返回消息的正文。The body of the returned message can then be either read or written. 可以在返回的消息上使用 方法读取消息正文。The message body can be read using the methods on the returned message. 返回的对象将所有子元素包装在 `Body` 元素内。The returned object encapsulates all the child elements within the `Body` element. 可以使用 或 写入消息正文。The message body can be written using or . 写入之后将无法读取。Once written, it cannot be read. 关闭消息的同时将关闭基础信封读取器。Closing the message closes the underlying envelope reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以没有标头或有一个或多个标头，这些标头作为一种扩展机制用来在应用程序特定的消息中传递信息。A can have zero or more headers that are used as an extension mechanism to pass information in messages that is application-specific. 通过调用 方法，可使用 将消息头添加到消息中。You can use to add message headers to a message by calling the method. 下表中所示，Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 提供了一系列预定义的消息标头。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) provides a number of predefined message headers, as shown in the following table. |标头名称Header Name|包含标头名称。Contains the header name.| |-----------------|-------------------------------| |到To|包含作为消息投递目标的角色。Contains the role that the message is targeting.| |操作Action|提供应如何处理消息的说明。Provides a description of how the message should be processed.| |FaultToFaultTo|包含错误应发送到的节点的地址。Contains the address of the node to which faults should be sent.| |FromFrom|包含发送消息的节点的地址。Contains the address of the node that sent the message.| |请求Request|指示消息是否为请求。Indicates whether the message is a request.| |MessageIDMessageID|包含消息的唯一 ID。Contains the unique ID of the message.| |RelatesToRelatesTo|包含与此消息相关的消息的 ID。Contains the IDs of messages that are related to this message.| |ReplyToReplyTo|包含对请求的答复应发送到的节点的地址。Contains the address of the node to which a reply should be sent for a request.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了使用通道工厂发送消息并读取回复的客户端。The following code example shows a client that uses the channel factory to send a message and read the reply. [!code-csharp[Message#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/message/cs/client.cs#0)] [!code-vb[Message#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/message/vb/client.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于标头中的信息通过网络传输，检查标头的实体必须支持标头使用的协议的基础版本。Because information in headers is transmitted on the wire, an entity that examines a header must support the underlying version(s) of the protocols used by the header. 但是，属性提供一种与版本更加无关的方式来批注消息。However, properties provide a more version-independent way of annotating a message.
